sentences.sContent: Come on then, tell me what happened; the suspense is killing me (= I feel very excited or anxious because I do not know what will happen next ) .
sentences.sCn: 快来，告诉我发生了什么事。急死我了。

sentences.sContent: She couldn’t bear the suspense a moment longer.
sentences.sCn: 这样提心吊胆，她再也受不了了。

synos.tran: 悬念；悬疑；焦虑；悬而不决

remMethod.val: sus (下面) + pens (悬挂) + e → 心在下面挂着 → 悬念

words.tran: 悬浮的；暂停的，缓期的（宣判）
悬疑的；令人紧张的；焦急不安的
暂停的；悬而不决的；可疑的；暧昧的
悬吊的；暂时中止的；支持的
[植] 胚柄；囊柄；悬带；吊绷带
延缓，推迟；使暂停；使悬浮；vi. 悬浮；禁赛

trans.tranCn: 悬念；悬疑；焦虑；悬而不决
trans.tranOther: a feeling of excitement or anxiety when you do not know what will happen next
